title: BARD - Masks Back in LA, Elon Update & Navarro Arrest Circumstances
itunes:title: BARD - Masks Back in LA, Elon Update & Navarro Arrest Circumstances
description:
Gary and Mark continue the Sunday BARD tradition as they give updates on Elon v. Twitter, mask mandates returning in Los Angeles, comments from the judge presiding over Peter Navarro's case and much more. Enjoy!

Watch Beyond A Reasonable Doubt on YouTube at YouTube.com/ReasonableDoubtPodcast and subscribe while you're there.
